rooms.description: A welcoming space with traditional Kerala wooden panels and stone finish. Uses natural light through openings and large windows.
Open-plan living area integrating dining space, designed with high ceilings and large verandas for enhanced ventilation.
Traditional Kerala kitchen with built-in wooden cabinetry and a window for natural light. Emphasis on Vastu by aligning entrance direction.
Spacious master bedroom featuring traditional Kerala-style motifs, integrated wardrobe, and east-facing windows for sunrise.
A guest bedroom with Vastu-aligned position and natural ventilation.
Connected to the master bedroom; designed with minimal openings for privacy while ensuring proper ventilation through skylights in the adjoining terrace roof space.

openings.description: Large wooden doors that welcome natural light and airflow.
High window placements to maximize daylighting and cross ventilation.
Large east-facing windows for natural light and optimal Vastu alignment.
Balcony-style windows to ensure ample natural lighting while maintaining privacy.
